#summary Albums made for swiveling
#labels Featured

Here are some albums that demonstrate what can be done with swivel viewers.  Click on the images to see viewers in a new page, since we can't embed them on the wiki pages on this site.

= Picasa Albums =

W. David Schwaderer has a [http://web.mac.com/innovationsurvival/Innovation_Survival/TestPicasa.html gallery] of innovative swivel albums.  He made some of them with his [http://www.spinpic.com/ SpinPic], an inexpensive motorized turntable of his own design.

= Other beautiful examples of turntable photography =

Theodore Gray built the beautiful <a href="http://periodictable.com/index.html">Photographic Periodic Table</a>, and made 360-degree videos and Quicktime VR movies of many of the samples.  His photos don't currently use Picasa or our standalone viewer, but they're very beautiful!

<a href="http://periodictable.com/Items/083.23/index.html"><img src="http://periodictable.com/Samples/083.23/s9s.JPG"/></a>

----

[http://3dvo.com/ 3DVO] is a company built on 360-degree photography.  They have a very nice proprietary viewer and a [http://www.3dvo.com/gallery.php gallery] of examples.
